Notes:
had the cam audio since a month ago, for a cam audio its good,
there was an italian cam out a month ago, invested hours on it, but it was too dark to use, so i waited
doing a release now with the web-dl looks a lot better
retail is in 3 weeks, so if you wanna watch it earlier here is your chance

Encode:
even the web-dl is quite dark, brightened it up without going over,and added sharpness
for the audio is was quite nice, cleaned as needed and lipsynced to my video
tried entering it into a the russian 5.1 track but music would have been louder as the voices, so i left it stereo

its an ok-watch
enjoy

Video: 720x400 @bitrate 1500 2pass
Audio: English Cam Stereo 2.0
Sample: yes included
